trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Punta Gorda
There were no other sightings in Punta Gorda on or around July 16th 2007
Summary: I went out to take a pic of the double rainbow
divs: Sighting Detailsit rained very hard and i took our german shep out and i saw the rainbow so i went in got the camera and came out and took some pics and when we were ther we saw this thing come out of no where and went straight up some n then it turned and it has a tail like a comet but then it went a little to the right and then back and then the clouds got in the way and i have a pic of it ther moving up and then in the clouds ,, it took me years to find this pic due to i just had my knee replaced and i was recouping , but very cool pics ,,, i have pics of this orb ,,the same sizes that appears in diff pics ,,,im happy to send this to yous now that i found them ,,i cant seem to down load them to you ,, but if you are interested ..let me know and i will work on it ,,,thanks again ,,
